STUB3M3.original: ~s~PHONECALL~n~~n~You must destroy a truck.~n~To help you, a bike is armed with a bomb.~n~Bomb becomes armed at 88mph and blows up if speed drops below 88mph.~n~~n~ You can use the bomb to destroy the enemy truck.
STUB3M3.translated: ~s~PHONECALL~n~~n~你必须摧毁一辆卡车。~n~一辆摩托车上装有炸弹来帮助你。~n~当速度为88迈时炸弹准备爆炸，此后若速度低于88迈就会爆炸。~n~~n~ 你可以用炸弹摧毁敌人的卡车。
